title.p: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of Guinea and the Government of the French Republic on the Reciprocal Promotion and Protection of Investments

preamble.p: The Government of the Republic of Guinea and the Government of the French Republic, hereinafter referred to as "the. Contracting Parties ",
Desiring to strengthen economic cooperation between the two States and to create favorable conditions for Guinean investments in France and French investments in Guinea,

Persuaded that the encouragement and protection of these investments is likely to stimulate the transfer of capital and technology between the two countries, in the interest of their economic development,
Have agreed on the following provisions:
